TopicTitle: I received a spam e-mail regarding the forum.

Articles.Content: Someone is trying to scam you into posting their adverts for them, if I were you I'd forward that email to my internet service providers spam prevention team.

> 
> Someone is trying to scam you into posting their adverts for them, if I were you I'd forward that email to my internet service providers spam prevention team.

I use Gmail.... what do I do then? My ISP i'm sure does not have a spam prevention team.

Also, how does it know that I peruse the forums?

... ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

> 
> I use Gmail.... what do I do then? My ISP i'm sure does not have a spam prevention team.
> Also, how does it know that I peruse the forums?
> 
> ... ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

The header suggests that this email is *already* in your spam folder, so google has taken care of it.

Bots browsing the web and collecting information... That's how they find out you use the forum. They're probably actively searching forums and matching that up with user handles/email addresses so they can better target their "audience"

I see you have your showing your twitter handle. There's a search vector...

mmm and someone in french?

translated

Hello, 

I would like to introduce myself. My name is Peter Florin, 

Since I has a large number of sites, 

I would like to offer a free link exchange with forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com 

or one of the various sites you own. 

You will surely be pleased to know that I have many ideas for link exchanges, 

which I am sure we will be both profitable and perfectly appropriate for our ranking in Google. 

Thank you to let me know if you are interested in more details or if you have other questions about it. 

In the meantime I remain at your disposal,

> 
> I would like to offer a free link exchange with forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com 
> or one of the various sites you own.

Translated according to Google Translate:

Hello!

The site seeks to cooperate. [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) found

What I'm trying to do is encourage your website to get better search results and page rank and traffic on Google.

However, this cooperation will not only include'm. But I have used in exchange, I'll give you the same thing for me. Thus, we must work together.

But how can you benefit or not. Three new members

I know that a small amount of data. But to be honest, it makes no sense to give detailed information about a person if the person is not interested.

So do not hesitate to contact me if you want to learn more about this, and I'll explain.

I'm almost 100% certain that it would make a heck of a lot more sense if I could read Russian... Almost.

I got spam mail a while ago, and it was way more convincing than this.

"the spam is illuminaiti"
Don't know about french version, but "in russian" message isn't really in russian. It's an example of an awful unedited machine translation into something resembling russian.
